remarks: Add two numerals ` M ` and ` N ` (with carry).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
decma.1 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
decma.2 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
decma.3 $e |- C e. NN0 $.
decma.4 $e |- D e. NN0 $.
decma.5 $e |- M = ; A B $.
decma.6 $e |- N = ; C D $.
decaddc.8 $e |- ( ( A + C ) + 1 ) = E $.
decaddc2.9 $e |- ( B + D ) = 10 $.
decaddc2 $p |- ( M + N ) = ; E 0 $.
